features: 100% recycled polyester fabric has hollow-core yarns and a diamond-grid back to trap warm air, wick moisture and dry fast; HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control
Easy-wearing pull-on pants with a self-fabric waistband for next-to-skin softness
Gusseted crotch for comfort and unimpeded mobility
Offset cuff seams and low-profile stitching for minimal bulk under boots
Forward-set, flatlock seams for a great fit and to minimize chafing
Layers easily under midlayers and outerwear
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn; hand-me-down ID label inside garment
